sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_oe_sfs.VACommonAdapterConstants</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>VACommonAdapterConstants</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var VACommonAdapterConstants = Class.create();

VACommonAdapterConstants.TABLES = {
    SYS_ALIAS: 'sys_alias',
    PROVIDER: 'sys_cs_provider',
    BOT_MESSAGES: {
        TABLE_NAME: 'sys_cs_bot_messages',
        COLUMNS: {
            SYS_CS_PROVIDER_APPLICATION: 'sys_cs_provider_application',
            NAME: 'name',
            VALUE: 'value',
            DESCRIPTION: 'description'
        }
    },
    PROVIDER_APPLICATION: {
        TABLE_NAME: 'sys_cs_provider_application',
        COLUMNS: {
            NAME: 'name',
            INBOUND_ID: 'inbound_id',
            PROVIDER: 'provider',
            MESSAGE_AUTH: 'message_auth',
            SHORT_DESCRIPTION: 'short_description',
            TRUSTED_MEDIA_DOMAINS: 'trusted_media_domains'
        }
    },
    ADAPTER_CONFIG_TEAMS: {
        TABLE_NAME: 'sys_cs_adapter_configuration_page_teams',
        COLUMNS: {
            NAME: 'name',
            EXTERNAL_ID: 'external_id',
            PROVIDER_AUTH: 'provider_auth',
        }
    },
    ADAPTER_CONFIG: {
        TABLE_NAME: 'sys_cs_adapter_configuration',
        COLUMNS: {
            SYS_CS_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION_PAGE: 'sys_cs_adapter_configuration_page',
            ATTRIBUTE_NAME: 'attribute_name',
            ATTRIBUTE_VALUE: 'attribute_value'
        }
    }
};

VACommonAdapterConstants.ACCEPT_SINGLE_FILE_PROMPT = gs.getMessage('(I can only accept one file.)');

VACommonAdapterConstants.SKIP_BUTTON_VALUE = 'skip';
VACommonAdapterConstants.NEXT_BUTTON_VALUE = 'next';]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-04-14 22:40:27</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>75f6dfe2533201101c1addeeff7b12ce</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>VACommonAdapterConstants</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Omni-Experience Standard Feature Set" source="sn_oe_sfs">53b1b0e79761011018b2fa98c253afcc</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Omni-Experience Standard Feature Set">53b1b0e79761011018b2fa98c253afcc</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_75f6dfe2533201101c1addeeff7b12ce</sys_update_name>

        <sys_updated_on>2022-07-06 15:51:18</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
